caption.p: Annual variations in the tree ring indices for P. orientalis: ( a) intercellular CO 2 concentrations (Ci), ( b) tree ring cellulose carbon isotope discrimination (Δ 13C), ( c) intrinsic water use efficiency (iWUE) derived from tree ring cellulose carbon isotopes (δ 13Cc) and atmospheric CO 2 concentrations between 1880 and 2014.
